regexCodeList.string: Overflowing with blood and other trophies of the dead, a sacrificial altar to the Lord of Warfare has been erected nearby.
Emanating an aura of purest Darkness, a megalithic black pyramid looms here, maintaining a silent, unblinking vigil against the Light.
Amethyst eyes glinting softly, the unobtrusive form of a black granite crocodile lurks here, its small but exquisitely carved scales shimmering with a faintly iridescent hue.
A gleaming, man-sized pillar of obsidian has risen here, rending the surrounding earth asunder in its wake and crackling with streams of ominous violet energy.
A magnificent sandstone altar is erected here to the Patron of Rogues, surrounded by statuettes of worshipping men and women.
A tall fountain of souls stands here, a steady stream of energy pouring forth from its centre.
Standing atop a raised marble dais an imposing cast-iron forge dominates, fire and heat radiating from this massive shrine to the Smith.
A golden wreath of the Seasons winds around the mouth of a cauldron sitting atop a granite pedestal.
A limestone statue of a crouching warrior woman with her palms flat on the ground is here, set before a stunted yew tree that has been split by a bolt of lightning.
An ice globe containing flickering flames hovers here, jets of steam shooting from the ground and holding it aloft.
A jagged fissure in the ground is here, a modest testament to the power of Artemis.
The hushed purl of cascading water whispers from a riverbrass shrine, wisps ofvapour rippling across the metal in a silent testament to the fluvial Queen.
A thick stone slab stained with dried blood looms here, tainting the area with the profane worship of Babel.
Echoes of delighted feminine laughter fill the air around this towering shrine to Pandora.
A twisting conflagration of gold and copper spires ripples sinuously here, the metallic flames burning in homage to the Lady of Sin.

Fiery sandstone is wrought into the form of an eight-pointed star, each point graced with an ever-glowing symbol of the Mitras. A sunburst has been seamlessly affixed to the centre of the design, radiating light as a silent reminder of the glory of the solstar.
A large vault surrounded by four pillars is placed here in tribute to the Merchant Lord.
This shrine is crafted into the form of three tall women standing back to back in a tight circle, hands clasped together at their sides.
Before you stands a large shrine, depicting a pack of wolves howling in triumph after their recent hunt.
Cold, ashen marble forms a large altar here, raised to the Lady Lorielan.
A huge shrine dominates the location and bathes it in intense light and rhythmic patterns of sound.
The broken fragments of a basalt altar litter the ground around the massive form of a bloodsteel stalagmite.
A violet flame in worship of Vengeance burns within the gaping maw of a black-marble serpent erupting from the ground here.
A gentle thrumming whispers from a mediocre riverbrass shrine, a silent testament to the fluvial Queen.
A crude shrine to the fluvial Queen rests here, the metal glistening with arcane glyphs.
A dormant shrine of (\w+) stands here.
Thousands of petals have been scattered around this stunning sculpture of the Goddess Selene in honour of Her.
A massive shrine in honour of Matsuhama stands here, a silent testament to the fallen warriors of the Lord of Combat.
A magnificent statue of Miramar, Goddess of Justice stands here, Her Scales held aloft in one hand while the other holds Her Sword at ready.
Consecrating its surroundings, a raging pyre burns white hot in homage to the Righteous Fire.

ScriptGroup.name: svo Shrine Idenfitier
ScriptGroup.script:
-- from Jaybles!
svo.enemy_shrines = { "Twilight", "Artemis", "Kastalia", "Melantha", "Miramar", "Mithraea", "Pentharian" }
svo.identify_shrine = function(name, size, line) if svo.is_shrine_enemy(name) then enemycolour = "hot_pink" else enemycolour = "deep_sky_blue" end
if size == "large" then healthcolour = "green" elseif size == "medium" then healthcolour = "a_yellow" elseif size == "small" then healthcolour = "dark_orange" else healthcolour = "red" end
local pos = selectString(line, 1) moveCursor("main", pos+#line-1, getLineNumber()) cinsertText(string.format(" <%s>(<%s>%s<%s>)", healthcolour, enemycolour, name, healthcolour)) moveCursorEnd() deselect() resetFormat() end
svo.is_shrine_enemy = function(name) for _, v in pairs(svo.enemy_shrines) do if name == v then return true end end return false end
